QuestData.Title: R.A.D. Anomalies
QuestData.Description:
There is a LOT of arcane energy here...
But! The R.A.D. can help with that! It's an awesome device--it's right in the name: "Rannan's Awesome Device!" It detects AND dispels arcane energy.
Here... hold it! Do you feel the POWER in your hands? No?
Well, now that you've got it, take it and dispel those anomalies!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the R.A.D. to dispel three arcane anomalies.
QuestData.RewardText:
Hm... You dispelled the anomalies, but the R.A.D. still detects an arcane surge... and it's rising by the minute.
That... can't be a good thing.
